select heart_rate,respiratory_rate,timestamp from zs_health_info
and `machine_id` = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT re.`id`, re.`record_status` as recordState, zmi.`machine_id`, zmi.machine_no, zmi.machine_num, zmi.battery, zmi.`box_battery`, zhi.heart_rate FROM record_ecg re LEFT JOIN zs_machine_info zmi ON re.`machine_id` = zmi.`machine_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zs_health_info WHERE machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, create_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME()))< 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) zhi
and `record_id` = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT re.`id`, re.`record_status`, zmi.`machine_id`, zmi.machine_no, zmi.machine_num, zmi.battery, zmi.`box_battery`, zhi.respiratory_rate FROM record_ecg re LEFT JOIN zs_machine_info zmi ON re.`machine_id` = zmi.`machine_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zs_health_info WHERE machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, create_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME()))< 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) zhi on zhi.machine_id = re.`machine_id`
and re.`id` = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
